title: Kitāb al-Raḥmah fī al-ṭibb wa-al-ḥikmah|كتاب الرحمة في الطب والحكمة،
additional_titles: Kitāb al-Raḥmah fī al-ṭibb wa-al-ḥikmah|Qaṣīdah ʻalá al-ṭibb|Qāla Masīḥ ibn al-Ḥakīm, iʻtalla Amīr al-Muʼminīn Hārūn al-Rashīd|Kalām ʻalá al-ṭabāyiʻ al-arbaʻah al-murakkabah fī al-insān|Dawāʼ lil-ḥikkah wa-al-sawdāʼ wa-al-nār al-fārisīyah wa-li-jamīʻ mā yakhruju min laḥm Banī Adam|ʻIlāj al-taṣrīf alladhī yatawalladu fī al-ʻunuq yuqālu la-hu al-mabsūṭ|Tafsīr al-aʻshāb al-qarḥāʼ
